Entry Requirements
==================

A Senior High School Certificate or equivalent pre – university qualifications; **_and_**
=========================================================================================

Pass the English Proficiency requirements; **_and_**
====================================================

Pass the Faculty interview -if appicable
========================================

[Entry requirements based on country](https://admission.utm.my/entry-requirements-ug-international/)

[English Requirements](https://admission.utm.my/english-language-requirements-3/)

[Health Requirements](https://admission.utm.my/health-requirements/)
